children.text: With over 25 years of experience from our parent company network in France, the USA, and Thailand, VINHAPAC is a pioneer in the multi-industry import-export and distribution sector. Our advantage lies in a deep understanding of international markets, professional operational processes, and a network of reputable manufacturing partners in Vietnam, committed to delivering sustainable value to our customers.
